Class Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Thing
      • Player
        • Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Mob

    public class Builder
extends Player
    Player type which can dig new rooms and avoid fights. Note: instances of this class are linked to a particular start room.

      • repr

        public java.lang.String repr()
        Get encoded representation.
        Specified by:
        repr in class Thing
        Returns:

        (eg "B;robert;There were ** chars but they were replaced")

      • decode

        public static Builder decode(java.lang.String encoded,
                             Room root)
        Factory to create Builder from a String
        Parameters:
        encoded - repr() form of the object
        root - Start room for this map
        Returns:
        decoded Object or null for failure. Failures include: null parameters, empty input or improperly encoded input.
